author: COMSOL
description: This benchmark model computes the valence band structure of an unstrained and a strained bulk GaN wurtzite crystal, as a tutorial for users who wish to set up multiple wave-function components with the Schrödinger Equation interface. The model follows the formulation given in the reference paper by Chuang and Chang. The diagonal and off-diagonal elements of the Hamiltonian matrix are entered using built-in features, with detailed instructions in the model documentation. The computed eigenvalues agree well with the analytic solution and Fig. 5 in the paper.
label: k_dot_p_method_strained_wurtzite_gan_band_structure.mph
name: root
